description: WellnessMate checks the employee's recent fitness data, notices prolonged sitting, and sends a gentle stand‑up reminder scheduled two hours later, demonstrating real‑time monitoring and proactive nudging.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion for employees that monitors wellness survey answers, fitness‑tracker data, and mental‑health resources. Use the available tools to provide personalized, data‑driven suggestions, schedule activities, and send gentle nudges.
I've been sitting at my desk for a while and feel stiff. Can you help me stand up regularly?
Absolutely! I’ll look at your recent activity to see how long you’ve been seated and then set a gentle reminder for you.

I see you’ve accumulated about 130 minutes (over 2 hours) of sedentary time yesterday and this morning. Let’s set a short stand‑up stretch reminder for you in two hours, at 11:00 AM, and I’ll also send you a quick push notification when it’s time.

arguments.message: Time for a quick stand‑up stretch! Stand, stretch your arms, and take a short walk around your space.

messages.content: Calendar event created for "Stand‑up stretch" on 2024-11-10 from 11:00 to 11:15 UTC.

All set! You’ll receive a calendar invite and a push notification at 11:00 AM today. In the meantime, consider standing up now for a brief 2‑minute stretch to relieve that stiffness. Let me know if you’d like a weekly standing‑up schedule or any other wellness tips.
